headline: Stock Market Strategy: InCred Equities lists 21 stocks to buy this June
intro: Despite a 4% gain in benchmark indices in 2025, Indian equity markets remain volatile due to global trade tensions. InCred Equities recommends 21 stocks with an ?Add? rating, highlighting a favorable monsoon and strong GVA growth as key positives for investors.
imagecaption: Stock Market Strategy: InCred Equities lists 21 stocks to buy this June

headline: Multiple explosions heard near Russian Air Base close to Ukraine border, cloud of smoke emerges | Watch
intro: At least 10 explosions were heard at the air base before a fire broke out. Local media also uploaded footages of smoke rising near the air base.
imagecaption: Plume of smoke emerges from the alleged explosion site

headline: Instagram adds 3:4 aspect ratio for uncropped, full-frame photo sharing
intro: Instagram has introduced support for 3:4 aspect ratio photos, allowing users to upload images as captured without cropping. The update enhances user experience for both single uploads and carousel posts, aligning with smartphone camera defaults.
imagecaption: In a notable update aimed at enhancing user experience, Instagram has officially introduced support for 3:4 aspect ratio photographs on its platform.

headline: Delhi HC directs YouTuber Mohak Mangal to take down video on ANI, allows re-upload after edits
intro: The case stems from a video Mangal published on 25 May, in which he accused ANI of blackmail and extortion. He alleged that a representative of the news agency demanded more than  ?40 lakh to lift copyright strikes issued against his channel.
imagecaption: According to YouTube's support website, if a channel gets three copyright strikes it is subject to termination along with any associated channels.

headline: Man who secretly filmed women on Bengaluru Metro and uploaded videos on Instagram arrested
intro: The controversial Instagram account featured 14 unsolicited videos and photos of female Bengaluru Metro commuters, all captured without their knowledge.
imagecaption: A man who secretly filmed women on the Bengaluru Metro and uploaded videos on Instagram has been arrested.(Representative image)

headline: SAMS Odisha +3 admission 2025: Registration date extended till June 1 ? check direct link, other FAQs
intro: SAMS Odisha +3 admission 2025: The Higher Education Department of Odisha has extended the registration for SAMS Odisha +3 Admission 2025 until June 1. Students can edit their application forms and upload Class 12 marks during this period. Read to know more
imagecaption: SAMS Odisha +3 admission 2025: Registration date extended till June 1 ? check direct link, other FAQs

headline: I/O 2025: 5 New Gemini features Google announced - all you need to know
intro: Google updates its Gemini app with new features for AI interaction, including free camera and screen sharing, advanced image and video tools, and personalised report generation. Users can also create interactive content in Canvas, while students gain access to a free academic year of Google AI Pro.
imagecaption: Google?s Gemini is levelling up. With Personal Context, it now uses your search history to offer personalised, proactive help, like reminding you about upcoming exams or suggesting tailored info before you even ask.

headline: UPL share price declines 5% after Q4 Results, Dividend declaration: Should you Buy,  Sell or Hold the stock?
intro: Stock Market today: UPL share price declined more than 5% during the intraday trades on Tuesday after Q4 Results that were declared on Monday but after the trading hours. UPL also declared Dividend. Should you Buy, Sell or Hold the stock?
imagecaption: Stock Market today: UPL share price declines post Q4 Results

headline: UPL, Tata Steel to Jyothy Labs: Five stocks remain in focus after declaring dividends
intro: Dividend Stocks: UPL, Tata Steel, Jyothy Labs, Avadh Sugar & Energy Limited, and Alufluoride Limited are five stocks that remain in focus following dividend announcements on Monday.
imagecaption: Dividend Stocks: Five stocks in focus on Dividend dclarartion

headline: Worst is over; specialty chemicals, new products to drive growth: UPL
intro: Currently, the company also stands to gain from the US-imposed tariff escalation, which would make it a preferable supplier over Chinese companies to American companies, said Jai Shroff, chairman and group CEO, UPL.
imagecaption: Latin America is its largest market, accounting for 38% of revenues.
